statements: SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkSchedules LIMIT 10;
SELECT schedule_id, work_date, start_time, end_time FROM RemoteWorkSchedules WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT schedule_id, task_description FROM RemoteWorkSchedules WHERE team_calendar_id = 456 ORDER BY work_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkSchedules WHERE task_description LIKE '%meeting%';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) as total_schedules FROM RemoteWorkSchedules GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkSchedules WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY work_date ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM RemoteWorkSchedules WHERE team_calendar_id = 10 AND work_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, task_description FROM RemoteWorkSchedules WHERE work_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY employee_id DESC, work_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkSchedules WHERE start_time < '09:00:00' AND end_time > '17:00:00' AND task_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_schedules FROM RemoteWorkSchedules WHERE team_calendar_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkSchedule;
SELECT work_id, work_date, start_time FROM RemoteWorkSchedule WHERE team_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM TeamCalendar WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT team_id, event_date, event_description FROM TeamCalendar WHERE event_id = 500;
SELECT work_id, team_id, work_date, start_time, end_time FROM RemoteWorkSchedule ORDER BY work_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkSchedule WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT work_id, work_date, start_time FROM RemoteWorkSchedule WHERE work_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT team_id, start_time, end_time FROM RemoteWorkSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT team_id, event_date, event_description FROM TeamCalendar WHERE event_description LIKE '%meeting%';
SELECT team_id, event_date, event_description FROM TeamCalendar ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM schedule ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT id, team_name FROM team WHERE department = 'IT' AND team_lead = 'John Doe';
SELECT event_name, location FROM event WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT id, team_name, department FROM team WHERE team_name LIKE '%Analytics%';
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM schedule ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT team_name, department FROM team WHERE team_lead = 'John Doe';
SELECT event_name, location, team_id FROM event WHERE event_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT team.team_name, team.team_lead, event.event_name FROM team JOIN event ON team.id = event.team_id ORDER BY event.event_date ASC;
SELECT schedule.date, schedule.start_time, team.team_name FROM schedule JOIN team ON schedule.employee_id = team.id WHERE schedule.date = '2023-02-15';
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkSchedule;
SELECT employee_name, start_time, end_time FROM RemoteWorkSchedule WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM TeamCalendar ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, department FROM TeamMembers WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY member_name;
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time, member_name FROM WorkShifts INNER JOIN TeamMembers ON WorkShifts.assigned_employee_id = TeamMembers.member_id;
SELECT * FROM RemoteWorkSchedule ORDER BY date DESC, start_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_name, date, start_time, end_time FROM RemoteWorkSchedule WHERE employee_name='John Doe' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_description FROM TeamCalendar WHERE event_date > '2022-06-01' AND event_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT member_name, department, role FROM TeamMembers WHERE department='HR' ORDER BY member_name ASC;

SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time, member_name FROM WorkShifts LEFT JOIN TeamMembers ON WorkShifts.assigned_employee_id = TeamMembers.member_id WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT team_name, team_lead_id FROM Teams ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT member_name, email_address FROM TeamMembers WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE team_id = 2 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, start_date, end_date FROM WorkSchedules WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT member_name, email_address FROM TeamMembers WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_lead_id FROM Teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE team_id = 2 AND event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_notes FROM Calendar JOIN Events ON Calendar.event_id = Events.event_id WHERE Events.team_id = 3;
